name: InterestingfactsabouttheWorld
0:
”Alexa open world facts”
”Alexa ask world facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell world facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world facts
des:
Ask for world Facts, and learn about how interesting our world is !!

world Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch world Facts" or "Alexa, open World Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
